name: 2D and 3D Godot: Game 04
description:
Game 04 is a 3D RPG Adventure in 2D and 3D Godot development project. In this learning game students needed to create 3D characters, a 3D environment, character movement, an intro screen, a dialog screen, an inventory system, and a save system. All of these elements are functional in the game.

Play keys: LMB - game start, dialog options mouse movement - rotation movement - WASD

Previously promoted games of  the same learning project:

Game 01 Ball-type

Game 02 2D turn-based adventure

Game 03 3D Platformer

Enjoy!
